name: dashchum
description: a simple HTML, CSS & JS test kit for DashMate

scripts.build: mkdir -p ./public/node_modules/dash/dist/ && cp index.* ./public/ && cp config.js ./public/ && cp ./node_modules/dash/dist/dash.min.js ./public/node_modules/dash/dist/
